Package suncertify.services

The services package centers around the BusinessServices interface linking server and clients and introduced to enable lean clients, and also provides the model side of the application-wide model-view-controller (MVC) framework in the form of the ContractorManager.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BusinessServices This business services interface is the one that is exposed to clients.
 

Class Summary
BookResult The result of an attempted book operation.
Contractor Property-based representation of a database record, and also used for search criteria on the object level, as opposed to the string array-based record representation.
ContractorManager Actually implements the BusinessServices interface designed to support lean clients.
Text Utility class wrapping text constants for the suncertify.services package.
 

Enum Summary
BookStatus Enumerates the possible returned statuses of an attempted booking operation.
 

Exception Summary
ServicesException A checked exception signaled by the BusinessServices implementation to indicate a problem with the data access.
 

Package suncertify.services Description

The services package centers around the BusinessServices interface linking server and clients and introduced to enable lean clients, and also provides the model side of the application-wide model-view-controller (MVC) framework in the form of the ContractorManager. Server and client exchange records as Contractor objects rather than String arrays; so the Contractor class is also defined in the scope of the services package.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lars Kuettner
